00049 template<typename IF,int N = 1>
00050 class tlm_initiator_port : 
00051   public sc_port<IF,N>,
00052   public tlm_initiator_port_base {
00053 
00054   typedef IF interface_type;
00055   typedef tlm_target_port<IF> target_port_type;
00056   typedef tlm_initiator_port<IF,N> initiator_port_type;

00059   typedef tlm_initiator_port_base initiator_port_base_type;

00159   sc_port<interface_type,N>(name)

00166 template<typename IF,int N>
00167 bool tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::is_interface_bound_twice(sc_export_base& target_port_) {
00168   for(int i=0;i<this->size();i++) {
00169     if ((*this)[i] == target_port_.get_interface()) {
00170       sc_object * tmp = dynamic_cast<sc_object * >(target_port_.get_interface());
00171       std::string if_name;
00172       if (tmp) if_name = tmp->name();
00173       else if_name = "unnamed interface/non sc_object";
00174 
00175       std::string msg(sc_object::name());
00176       msg += (std::string)(": tlm_initiator_port warning, while binding the interface \"");
00177       msg += if_name + (std::string)("\" exported by target port ");
00178       msg += (std::string)(target_port_.name()) + (std::string)(": the initiator port is already bound to this interface\n");
00179       SC_REPORT_WARNING("binding warning",msg.c_str());
00180         
00181       return(true);
00182     }
00183   }
00184   return(false);
00185 }

00187 //---------------------------
00188 // sc_port overridden methods
00189 //---------------------------
00190   
00191 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 // before_end_of_elaboration()
00193 // Called just before end of elaboration to propagate registered target ports to all the 
00194 // bound initiator ports
00195 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 template<typename IF,int N>
00197 void 
00198 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::before_end_of_elaboration()
00199 {
00200 
00201   // Registered target port list propagation (complete sharing of target_port_list between all initiator ports)
00202   // If current port's target port list exist, share the list with all other port of the chain using the 
00203   // reversed initiator port list.
00204   if (m_target_port_list.size()) {
00205     for(typename std::vector<initiator_port_base_type *>::iterator port = get_reversed_initiator_port_list().begin();
00206         port != get_reversed_initiator_port_list().end();
00207         port++) {                
00208 
00209       // Copy the target port(s) to the target port list of the registered initiator (port info. propagation)
00210       if ((*port) != this) {
00211         for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator target_port = m_target_port_list.begin();
00212             target_port != m_target_port_list.end();
00213             target_port++) {
00214           (*port)->register_target_port((*target_port));
00215         }
00216       }
00217     }
00218   }
00219 
00220   // Recreate the complete list of registered initiator_port, from deeper port to higher port (hierarchically speaking)
00221   // Objective: deeper port is able to "see" all others but intermediate port cannot "see" deeper ports.
00222   std::vector<initiator_port_base_type *> tmp_initiator_port_list; 
00223   tmp_initiator_port_list.push_back(this);
00224   this->create_port_list(tmp_initiator_port_list);
00225   // replace the regular initiator port list: this list is now complete
00226   this->set_initiator_port_list(tmp_initiator_port_list);
00227 }
00228 
00229 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00230 // end_of_elaboration()
00231 // Check the target port list: if empty, stops the simulation as initiator port should be bound at 
00232 // least to one target_port
00233 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 template<typename IF,int N>
00235 void 
00236 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::end_of_elaboration() {
00237 
00238 #ifdef TLM_PORT_DEBUG
00239   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: Registered initiator port list :\n",sc_object::name());
00240   for(typename std::vector<initiator_port_base_type *>::iterator port = get_initiator_port_list().begin();
00241       port != get_initiator_port_list().end();
00242       port++) {
00243     printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: \t- %s\n",sc_object::name(),(static_cast<initiator_port_type * >(*port))->name());
00244       
00245   }
00246   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: Registered initiator reversed port list :\n",sc_object::name());
00247   for(typename std::vector<initiator_port_base_type *>::iterator port = get_reversed_initiator_port_list().begin();
00248       port != get_reversed_initiator_port_list().end();
00249       port++) {
00250     printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: \t- %s\n",sc_object::name(),(static_cast<initiator_port_type * >(*port))->name());
00251       
00252   }
00253 
00254   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: Registered target port list:\n",sc_object::name());
00255   for(typename std::vector<target_port_base_type *>::iterator port = get_target_port_list().begin();
00256       port != get_target_port_list().end();
00257       port++) {
00258     printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: \t- %s\n",sc_object::name(),(static_cast<target_port_type * >(*port))->name());
00259       
00260   }
00261 
00262   printf("DEBUG\t\t%s: -------------------------------------------------------\n",sc_object::name());
00263 
00264 #endif
00265   // Checks the target port list
00266   if ((!get_target_port_list().size()) && this->size()) {
00267     std::string msg(sc_object::name());
00268     msg += (std::string)(": tlm_initiator_port error, target port list is empty. Initiator port should be bound at least to one target port\n");
00269     SC_REPORT_ERROR("port end of elaboration",msg.c_str());
00270   }
00271 }

00273 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 // Special binding between initiator port and target port.
00275 // (port registration added to the standard sc_port_base::bind())
00276 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00277 
00278 //---------------------------------------------------------
00279 // bind(sc_export)
00280 //---------------------------------------------------------
00281 template<typename IF,int N>
00282 void 
00283 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::bind(target_port_type& target_port_) {
00284   if (!is_interface_bound_twice(target_port_))
00285     // Registers the target port
00286     register_target_port(&target_port_);
00287     
00288   // Calls sc_port standard bind() method 
00289   sc_port_b<interface_type>::bind(target_port_);
00290 }
00291 
00292 
00293 template<typename IF,int N>
00294 template<typename OTHER_IF>
00295 void 
00296 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::bind(tlm_target_port<OTHER_IF>& target_port_) {
00297   // Test if OTHER_IF derives from IF
00298   IF * other_if = dynamic_cast<IF*>(target_port_.get_interface());
00299   if (other_if) {
00300 
00301     if (!is_interface_bound_twice(target_port_))      
00302       // Registers the target port
00303       this->register_target_port(&target_port_);
00304 
00305     // Calls sc_port standard bind() method 
00306     sc_port_b<interface_type>::bind(*other_if);
00307   }
00308   else {        
00309     std::string msg(sc_object::name());
00310     msg += (std::string)(": tlm_initiator_port error, incompatible interface detected during the binding tlm_initiator_port  \"") + (std::string)(this->name());
00311     msg += (std::string)" to tlm_target_port \"" + (std::string)(target_port_.name()) +(std::string)("\"\n") ;
00312     SC_REPORT_ERROR("bind export to export failed",msg.c_str());
00313   }
00314 }

00318 //---------------------------------------------------------
00319 // operator() (sc_export): just calls bind(sc_export)
00320 //---------------------------------------------------------
00321 template<typename IF,int N>
00322 void 
00323 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::operator() (target_port_type& target_port_) {
00324   bind(target_port_);
00325 }
00326 
00327 //---------------------------------------------------------
00328 // bind(sc_port) 
00329 //---------------------------------------------------------
00330 template<typename IF,int N>
00331 void 
00332 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::bind(sc_port_b<interface_type>& port_) {
00333   // Register the bound port in the regular list
00334   this->register_initiator_port(static_cast<initiator_port_type *>(&port_));
00335 
00336   // Bound port registers the current port. Used to share the target port list between all port before the end of elaboration
00337   for(typename std::vector<initiator_port_base_type *>::iterator initiator_port = get_reversed_initiator_port_list().begin();
00338       initiator_port != get_reversed_initiator_port_list().end();
00339       initiator_port++) {
00340     static_cast<initiator_port_type *>(&port_)->reversed_register_initiator_port(*initiator_port);
00341   }
00342 
00343   // Calls sc_port standard bind() method 
00344   sc_port_b<interface_type>::bind(port_);
00345 }
00346   
00347 //---------------------------------------------------------
00348 // operator() (sc_port): just calls bind(sc_port)
00349 //---------------------------------------------------------
00350 template<typename IF,int N>
00351 void  
00352 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::operator() (sc_port_b<interface_type>& port_) {
00353   bind(port_);
00354 }

00361 //---------------------------------------------------------

00364 template<typename IF,int N>
00365 void 
00366 tlm_initiator_port<IF,N>::bind(interface_type& interface_) {
00367   // Calls sc_port standard bind method
00368   sc_port_b<interface_type>::bind(interface_);    
00369 }
